sys_script_include.name: aiabRest

sys_update_version.name: sys_script_include_5c94b318c373221052e098bc05013129
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>public</access><active>true</active><api_name>global.aiabRest</api_name><caller_access/><client_callable>false</client_callable><description/><mobile_callable>false</mobile_callable><name>aiabRest</name><sandbox_callable>false</sandbox_callable><script><![CDATA[var aiabRest = Class.create();
aiabRest.prototype = {
    initialize: function() {},
    send: function(restObj) {
        var restMessage = new sn_ws.RESTMessageV2();
        var midServerEnabled = gs.getProperty('ai_in_a_box.config.midserver.enabled', 'true');
        var method = restObj.method || 'get';
        var path = restObj.path || '/';
        var body = restObj.body || {};
        var headers = restObj.headers || {};
        var host = gs.getProperty('ai_in_a_box.config.server.aiab.url', 'http://192.168.1.215:3333');
        restMessage.setHttpMethod(method);
        restMessage.setEndpoint(host + path);
        if (midServerEnabled == "true") {
            var midServerName = gs.getProperty('ai_in_a_box.config.midserver', '676578c1fc77-mid.docker');
            restMessage.setMIDServer(midServerName);
        }
        var aiabAuth = gs.getProperty('ai_in_a_box.config.server.aiiab.auth');
        aiabAuth = 'Basic ' + GlideStringUtil.base64Encode(aiabAuth);
        restMessage.setRequestHeader('authorization', aiabAuth);
        var llmAuth = gs.getProperty('ai_in_a_box.config.server.llm.auth');
        restMessage.setRequestHeader('llm_auth', 'Bearer ' + llmAuth);
        restMessage.setRequestHeader('Content-type', 'application/json');
        // lets get all the features
        var properties = new GlideRecord('sys_properties');
        var propertyQuery = 'nameSTARTSWITHai_in_a_box.feature.';
        propertyQuery += '^ORnameSTARTSWITHai_in_a_box.config.';
        properties.addQuery(propertyQuery);
        properties.query();
        while (properties.next()) {
            var name = properties.getValue('name');
            var value = gs.getProperty(name);
            restMessage.setRequestHeader(name, value);
        }
        restMessage.setRequestHeader('ai_in_a_box.config.endpoint', 'https://' + gs.getProperty('instance_name') + '.service-now.com');
        // Set custom headers from caller - these override defaults
        for (var header in headers) {
            restMessage.setRequestHeader(header, headers[header]);
        }
        // Always stream - no option to disable
        body.stream = true;
        if (typeof body.model == "undefined") {
            body.model = gs.getProperty('ai_in_a_box.config.server.llm.model');
        }
        restMessage.setRequestBody(JSON.stringify(body));
        // Only set user.id if not already provided in headers
        if (!headers['ai_in_a_box.user.id']) {
            restMessage.setRequestHeader('ai_in_a_box.user.id', gs.getUserID());
        }
        var response = restMessage.executeAsync();
        var error = response.haveError();
        var statusCode = response.getStatusCode();
        if (error) {
            var errorCode = response.getErrorCode();
            var errorMsg = response.getErrorMessage();
            gs.error("AIAB REST ERROR MESSAGE: " + errorMsg);
            gs.error("AIAB REST ERROR CODE: " + errorCode);
            gs.error("AIAB REST ERROR: " + error);

            return {
                body: JSON.stringify({
                    contents: errorMsg,
                    error: errorCode,
                    headers: restMessage.getRequestHeaders(),
                    status: statusCode
                }),
            };
        } else {
            var responseBody = response.getBody();
            return {
                body: responseBody,
                status: statusCode
            };
        }
    },
    type: 'aiabRest'
};]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>jacebenson</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2025-09-01 19:12:27</sys_created_on><sys_id>5c94b318c373221052e098bc05013129</sys_id><sys_mod_count>13</sys_mod_count><sys_name>aiabRest</sys_name><sys_package display_value="AI in a Box" source="0439d1f593948210071230a97bba1016">0439d1f593948210071230a97bba1016</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="AI in a Box">0439d1f593948210071230a97bba1016</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_5c94b318c373221052e098bc05013129</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>opencode</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2026-01-15 07:14:45</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>
